children.raw_text: This Standard is the Vehicle Standard (Australian Design Rule 60/00 – Centre High Mounted Stop Lamp) 2006.
children.full_path: A. LEGISLATIVE PROVISIONS/A.1. NAME OF STANDARD/A.1.1.
children.scope: [Centre High-mounted Stop Lamp]-[Legislative Provisions]-[Standard Name]

children.raw_text: This Standard may also be cited as Australian Design Rule 60/00 — Centre High Mounted Stop Lamp.
children.full_path: A. LEGISLATIVE PROVISIONS/A.1. NAME OF STANDARD/A.1.2.
children.scope: [Centre High-mounted Stop Lamp]-[Legislative Provisions]-[Standard Name]

children.full_path: A. LEGISLATIVE PROVISIONS/A.1. NAME OF STANDARD
children.scope: [Centre High-mounted Stop Lamp]-[Legislative Provisions]-[Standard Name]

chapters.raw_text: The function of this Australian Design Rule is to specify requirements for a supplementary ‘Centre High-mounted Stop Lamp’ on the rear of the vehicle, to provide an additional indication to other road users to the rear of the vehicle that the driver of the vehicle is applying the service brakes.

children.raw_text: This ADR applies to the design and construction of vehicles as set out in the table below.
children.full_path: C. APPLICABILITY AND IMPLEMENTATION/C.1. Applicability Summary/C.1.1.
children.scope: [Centre High-mounted Stop Lamp]-[Centre High-mounted Stop Lamp] - [Applicability Summary]

children.raw_text: Those vehicles must be equipped with a ‘Centre High-mounted Stop Lamp’ complying with the relevant requirements of this National Standard.
children.full_path: C. APPLICABILITY AND IMPLEMENTATION/C.1. Applicability Summary/C.1.2.
children.scope: [Centre High-mounted Stop Lamp]-[Centre High-mounted Stop Lamp] - [Applicability Summary]

children.raw_text: Vehicles complying with the requirements for S3 category stop lamps in ADR 49/00, installed in accordance with the requirements for S3 category stop lamps in ADR 13/00 need not comply with this national standard.
children.full_path: C. APPLICABILITY AND IMPLEMENTATION/C.1. Applicability Summary/C.1.3.
children.scope: [Centre High-mounted Stop Lamp]-[Centre High-mounted Stop Lamp] - [Applicability Summary]

refs.anchor_text: requirements for S3 category stop lamps
requirements for S3 category stop lamps

PART I PHOTOMETRIC REQUIREMENTS
children.scope: [Centre High-mounted Stop Lamp]-[定义]-[引用]

refs.doc_id: Vehicle Standard (Australian Design Rule Definitions and Vehicle Categories) 2005

children.raw_text: Colour of light emitted: Red to SAE document J578c, February, 1977 "Color Specification for Electric Signal Lighting Devices", or as specified in clause 60.3.2.
children.scope: [Centre High-mounted Stop Lamp]-[Centre High-mounted Stop Lamp] - [Specification] - [Light Color]

refs.anchor_text: Color Specification for Electric Signal Lighting Devices

children.raw_text:
In each direction corresponding to the points in the light distribution table of clause 60.3.1, the luminous intensity must be not less than the figure specified in the table for the direction in question.
* The category code may also be in the format L1, LA etc.
children.full_path: 60.2. SPECIFICATION/60.2.2. Intensity of light emitted/60.2.2.1. Minimum:
children.scope: [Centre High-mounted Stop Lamp]-[Centre High-mounted Stop Lamp] - [Specification] - [Light Intensity] - [Minimum Intensity]

children.raw_text: The luminous intensity must not exceed this maximum over an area larger than that generated by a 0.25o radius within a solid cone angle from 10L to 10R and from 10U to 5D.
children.full_path: 60.2. SPECIFICATION/60.2.2. Intensity of light emitted/60.2.2.2. Maximum: 160 cd in any direction.
children.scope: [Centre High-mounted Stop Lamp]-[Centre High-mounted Stop Lamp] - [Specification] - [Light Intensity] - [Maximum Intensity]
[Centre High-mounted Stop Lamp]-[Centre High-mounted Stop Lamp] - [Specification] - [Light Intensity]

children.raw_text: Minimum angles of light distribution referred to the reference axis
Vertical: from 10o above to 5o below the horizontal.
children.scope: [Centre High-mounted Stop Lamp]-[Centre High-mounted Stop Lamp] - [Specification] - [Light Distribution Angles] - [Vertical Angles]

children.raw_text: Horizontal: from 10o to the left to 10o to the right.
children.scope: [Centre High-mounted Stop Lamp]-[Centre High-mounted Stop Lamp] - [Specification] - [Light Distribution Angles] - [Horizontal Angles]
[Centre High-mounted Stop Lamp]-[Centre High-mounted Stop Lamp] - [Specification] - [Light Distribution Angles]

children.raw_text: Each lamp must:-
have an effective projected luminous area not less than 29 square centimetres;
children.scope: [Centre High-mounted Stop Lamp]-[Centre High-mounted Stop Lamp] - [Specification] - [Other Requirements] - [Luminous Area]

children.raw_text: not contain symbols, letters or characters other than those necessary for part number, manufacturer’s identification and/or approval number identification;
children.scope: [Centre High-mounted Stop Lamp]-[Centre High-mounted Stop Lamp] - [Specification] - [Other Requirements] - [Markings]

children.raw_text: provide access for convenient replacement of the globe without the use of special tools;
children.scope: [Centre High-mounted Stop Lamp]-[Centre High-mounted Stop Lamp] - [Specification] - [Other Requirements] - [Globe Replacement]

children.raw_text: provide a steady warning light;
children.scope: [Centre High-mounted Stop Lamp]-[Centre High-mounted Stop Lamp] - [Specification] - [Other Requirements] - [Light Type]

children.raw_text: except as provided in clauses 60.2.1 to 60.2.4.2, be designed to conform to the relevant requirements of clauses 1 to 3 of SAE document J186a, September, 1977 "Supplemental High Mounted Stop and Rear Turn Signal Lamps", except that:
Table 1 of that SAE document is replaced by the light distribution table of clause 60.3.1;
children.scope: [Centre High-mounted Stop Lamp]-[Centre High-mounted Stop Lamp] - [Specification] - [Other Requirements] - [SAE Conformance] - [Table Replacement]

children.raw_text:
lamps designed solely for mounting inside the vehicle need not meet the requirements of paragraphs 3.1.6 Moisture Test; 3.1.7 Dust Test; and
3.1.8 Corrosion Test of that SAE document.
children.scope: [Centre High-mounted Stop Lamp]-[Centre High-mounted Stop Lamp] - [Specification] - [Other Requirements] - [SAE Conformance] - [Exemption for Interior Lamps]

children.full_path: 60.3. LIGHT TABLES/60.3.2. Colour of light trichromatic co-ordinates/60.3.2.1.
children.scope: [Centre High-mounted Stop Lamp]-[Centre High-mounted Stop Lamp] - [Light Tables] - [Colour of Light Trichromatic Coordinates] - [Red Light Limits]

children.raw_text:
For verifying the limits above, a source of light at a colour temperature of 2856K (illuminant A of the International Commission of Illumination (CIE)), in combination with appropriate filters, may be used.
PART II INSTALLATION

children.raw_text: In width: on the vehicle’s median longitudinal plane.

lens portion lower than rear window bottom edge (other vehicles)

children.scope: [Centre High-mounted Stop Lamp]-[Centre High-mounted Stop Lamp] - [Specification] - [Position]

children.raw_text: The reference axis of the lamp when fitted to the vehicle must be parallel to the bearing plane of the vehicle on the road and lie in the median longitudinal plane of the vehicle.
Vertical: from 10o above to 5o below the horizontal.
children.scope: [Centre High-mounted Stop Lamp]-[Centre High-mounted Stop Lamp] - [Specification] - [Geometric visibility] - [Vertical angles]

children.raw_text: Horizontal:  from 10o to the left to 10o to the right.
children.scope: [Centre High-mounted Stop Lamp]-[Centre High-mounted Stop Lamp] - [Specification] - [Geometric visibility] - [Horizontal angles]
[Centre High-mounted Stop Lamp]-[Centre High-mounted Stop Lamp] - [Specification] - [Geometric visibility] - [Reference axis]
[Centre High-mounted Stop Lamp]-[Centre High-mounted Stop Lamp] - [Specification] - [Geometric visibility]
[Centre High-mounted Stop Lamp]-[Centre High-mounted Stop Lamp] - [Specification] - [Orientation]

children.chapter_title: May not be "grouped" with any other lamp.
children.full_path: 60.4. SPECIFICATION/60.4.7. May not be "grouped" with any other lamp.
children.scope: [Centre High-mounted Stop Lamp]-[Centre High-mounted Stop Lamp] - [Specification] - [Grouping restriction]

children.raw_text: May not be "combined" with any other lamp or reflective device.
children.scope: [Centre High-mounted Stop Lamp]-[Centre High-mounted Stop Lamp] - [Specification] - [Combination restriction]

children.raw_text: May not be "reciprocally incorporated" with any other lamp.
children.scope: [Centre High-mounted Stop Lamp]-[Centre High-mounted Stop Lamp] - [Specification] - [Reciprocal incorporation restriction]

children.raw_text: Electrical Operation shall be activated upon and only upon application of the service brakes.
children.scope: [Centre High-mounted Stop Lamp]-[Centre High-mounted Stop Lamp] - [Specification] - [Electrical operation]
[Centre High-mounted Stop Lamp]-[Centre High-mounted Stop Lamp] - [Specification] - [Tell-tale]

children.raw_text: If the lamp is mounted inside the vehicle, it must be shrouded to the glass or other means must be provided to minimise reflections from the light of the lamp upon the rear window glazing that might be visible to the driver when viewed directly, or indirectly, in the rear vision mirror.
children.scope: [Centre High-mounted Stop Lamp]-[Centre High-mounted Stop Lamp] - [Specification] - [Other requirements]

chapters.scope: [Centre High-mounted Stop Lamp]-[Centre High-mounted Stop Lamp] - [Specification]

children.raw_text: The technical requirements of FMVSS 108 “Lamps, reflective devices, and associated equipment” or “High-mounted Stop Lamp” are deemed to be equivalent to the technical requirements of this rule.
children.scope: [Centre High-mounted Stop Lamp]-[Centre High-mounted Stop Lamp] - [Alternative Standards] - [Equivalence Determination]

refs.anchor_text: Lamps, reflective devices, and associated equipment or High-mounted Stop Lamp

children.raw_text:
The technical requirements of Category S3 stop lamps of United Nations Regulation 7/02 read with supplement 2 to the 02 series of amendments and installed in accordance with United Nations Regulation 48/01.
COMPILATION NOTES This compilation of Vehicle Standard (Australian Design Rule 60/00 – Centre High Mounted Stop Lamp) 2006 includes all the instruments set out in the Table of Instruments.  This vehicle standard is determined under section 12 of the Road Vehicle Standards Act 2018.
The Table of Amendments provides a history of clauses that have been amended, inserted or deleted.
